qlearning.domain.quality

Interface QualityUpdateStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackwardInduction

    public interface QualityUpdateStrategy
    A strategy for getting the next Quality value after one learning iteration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Quality next(Quality oldQuality, LearningRate learningRate, Reward reward, DiscountFactor discountFactor, Quality optimalFutureValueEstimate)
      Get the next Quality value

    • Method Detail

      • next

        Quality next(Quality oldQuality,
             LearningRate learningRate,
             Reward reward,
             DiscountFactor discountFactor,
             Quality optimalFutureValueEstimate)
        Get the next Quality value
        Parameters:
        oldQuality - the quality value of the previous State-Action pair
        learningRate - the LearningRate factor for this update
        reward - the Reward for the current State
        discountFactor - the DiscountFactor for this update
        optimalFutureValueEstimate - the highest expected Quality that we can get after transition to the next State
        Returns:
        the new Quality value for this State
